pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====pyddq=====Python API of Drunken Data Quality.https://github.com/FRosner/drunken-data-qualityDescription===========DDQ is a small library for checking constraints on Spark data structures.It can be used to assure a certain data quality, especially when continuous imports happen.Note====This project has been set up using PyScaffold 2.5.6. For details and usageinformation on PyScaffold see http://pyscaffold.readthedocs.org/.
